quotes.text: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work at hand. The sun's rays do not burn until brought to a focus.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.text: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: Lack of direction, not lack of time, is the problem. We all have twenty-four hour days.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: It's not that I'm so smart, it's just that I stay with problems longer.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Focusing is about saying No.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: The main thing is to keep the main thing the main thing.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.text: You will never reach your destination if you stop and throw stones at every dog that barks.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Multitasking is a lie.
quotes.author: Gary Keller

quotes.text: To do two things at once is to do neither.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.text: The shorter way to do many things is to do only one thing at a time.
quotes.author: Mozart

quotes.text: Be like a postage stamp. Stick to one thing until you get there.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.text: Simplicity boils down to two steps: Identify the essential. Eliminate the rest.
quotes.author: Leo Babauta

quotes.text: If you chase two rabbits, you will not catch either one.
quotes.author: Russian Proverb

quotes.text: The art of being wise is the art of knowing what to overlook.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.text: Starve your distractions, feed your focus.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Focus on the journey, not the destination. Joy is found not in finishing an activity but in doing it.
quotes.author: Greg Anderson

quotes.text: Where focus goes, energy flows.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Don't be afraid of missing opportunities. Behind every failure is an opportunity somebody wishes they had missed.
quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

quotes.text: The key to success is to focus our conscious mind on things we desire not things we fear.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: Concentrate on your strengths, recognize your weaknesses, and be aware of your limitations.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: My success, part of it certainly, is that I have focused in on a few things.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: I don't care how much power, brilliance or energy you have, if you don't harness it and focus it on a specific target, and hold it there you're never going to accomplish as much as your ability warrants.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

quotes.text: The difference between successful people and very successful people is that very successful people say 'no' to almost everything.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.text: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Discipline is just choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
quotes.author: Augusta F. Kantra

quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: Your focus determines your reality.
quotes.author: George Lucas

quotes.text: Stay focused, go after your dreams and keep moving toward your goals.
quotes.author: LL Cool J

quotes.text: You can't depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: When walking, walk. When eating, eat.
quotes.author: Zen Proverb

quotes.text: Success demands singleness of purpose.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: It is not enough to be busy... The question is: what are we busy about?
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: What you stay focused on will grow.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: Attention is the rarest and purest form of generosity.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.text: Whenever you want to achieve something, keep your eyes open, concentrate and make sure you know exactly what it is you want. No one can hit their target with their eyes closed.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.text: The first rule of focus is this: "Wherever you are, be there."
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Focus is a matter of deciding what things you're not going to do.
quotes.author: John Carmack

quotes.text: If you don't pay appropriate attention to what has your attention, it will take more of your attention than it deserves.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.text: Don't dwell on what went wrong. Instead, focus on what to do next. Spend your energies on moving forward toward finding the answer.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.text: The secret of change is to focus all of your energy, not on fighting the old, but on building the new.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: The more you lose yourself in something bigger than yourself, the more energy you will have.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.text: Focus on the present moment. It's the only moment you have control over.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The ability to concentrate and to use time well is everything.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.text: You can always find a distraction if you're looking for one.
quotes.author: Tom Kite

quotes.text: The road to success is dotted with many tempting parking spaces.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: One way to boost our will power and focus is to manage our distractions instead of letting them manage us.
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

quotes.text: The most valuable skill in our economy is becoming increasingly rare. If you master this skill, you'll achieve extraordinary results.
quotes.author: Cal Newport
